title: Ribeirinho (Beco do)
body: It connects the alley of Rêgo with the Conveniência, near the Avenida de João de Deus. It was more extensive in the past than it is today, and it was allowed in a city council session on June 12, 1902, for the owner of the quinta das Rosas to close it near the alley of Conveniência, with the condition, however, of giving the levadeiro of the levada das Hortas a key to the door that closes the entrance of the alley, on the side of the mentioned avenue.
